[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Greek Fire provides unique upgrades to naval units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Trained Archers provides unique upgrades to archery units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Manoeuvre Warfare provides unique upgrades to gunpowder units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Patriotic War provides unique upgrades to gunpowder and mounted units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Superior Seamanship provides unique upgrades to naval units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Engineer Corps provides unique upgrades to siege units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Trench War provides unique upgrades to gunpowder units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Blitzkrieg provides unique upgrades to armoured units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Mass Production, uniquely, does not provide any promotions, but rather makes upgrades cheaper for all mechanical units, and speeds up their production.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Artillery Schools provide unique upgrades to siege units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Spec Ops provides passive bonuses to gunpowder and recon units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Power Projection provides unique upgrades to naval units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Guerilla Tactics provides unique upgrades to gunpowder and recon units.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrines[COLOR_REVERT] are founded by Great Generals. Most of them provide certain unit types with unique upgrade lines. Every [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Doctrine[COLOR_REVERT] can only be founded once per game. Napalm Strikes provide unique bonuses to helicopter units.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Provisional Government[COLOR_REVERT] means that a city experiences no separatism for 25 turns after it is conquered or acquired by any other means.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Solidarity[COLOR_REVERT] means that a city of a newly settled barbarain civilization experiences no separatism for 50 turns and a large bonus to its yields.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Unrest[COLOR_REVERT] means that a city is close to an open revolt against its owner.
When [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Riots[COLOR_REVERT] are happening in a city, it has a higher separatism and lower production levels. Riots will only go away if you manage to drop separatism to 0%.
The rebel leaders have been [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]bribed[COLOR_REVERT] to put a check on the rebellion. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns.
The governor of this province has been [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]replaced[COLOR_REVERT] with a less strict one. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns, but production and taxation suffer.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]harsh treatment[COLOR_REVERT] of local populace inspired fear. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns, at a cost of population loss and unhappiness. Requires Autocracy or Dictatorship to enact.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]sermon[COLOR_REVERT] appealed to the loyalty of local faithful. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns. Requires Theocracy to enact.
The city has received a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]tax break[COLOR_REVERT]. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns, and so is the gold revenue. Requires Monarchy, Theocracy or Democracy to enact.
A harsh [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]curfew[COLOR_REVERT] is in place in this city. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns, but productivity suffers. Requires Dictatorship to enact.
A series of political [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]arrests[COLOR_REVERT] has decapitated local separatist rebels. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns. Requires Lubyanka wonder to enact.
A major [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]propaganda[COLOR_REVERT] campaign has been conducted in the city. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns. Requires Dictatorship or Democracy to enact.
The region has been granted a broad [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]autonomy[COLOR_REVERT]. Separatism is decreased for 50 turns, at a price of minor productivity and revenue loss. Requires Democracy to enact.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kremlin[COLOR_REVERT] lowers maintenance of all cities by -10% through the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Voivodship[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mit'a[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free craftsman and +1 food.
Unlike other civilizations' [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wandering Capital[COLOR_REVERT] can be freely relocated to other cities once built.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ikhandas[COLOR_REVERT], the Zulu replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baracks[COLOR_REVERT], grant experience points to troops built in their cities and generate +1 food.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ikhandas[COLOR_REVERT] der Zulu ersetzen die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kasernen[COLOR_REVERT]. Sie gewähren den in der Stadt ausgebildeten Truppen zusätzliche Erfahrungspunkte und reduzieren die städtischen Unterhaltskosten.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arg-e Bam[COLOR_REVERT] increases the urban logistics by 2 and provides a major defensive bonus.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pearl Diver[COLOR_REVERT] provides additional commerce to fishing boats and +1 happiness with pearls.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gladiator School[COLOR_REVERT] provides +1 happiness, a gold bonus and experience to melee and recon units, but doubles the chance of [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]slave revolts[COLOR_REVERT].
